name: Syberia
description: This script will install Syberia Gog edition with DxWnd to play the game fullscreen.
notes: This script will use nircmd.exe as a workaround for the black wIndow bug.

write_file.content:
cd c:\dxwnd
start dxwnd.exe /r:0
cd "c:\GOG Games\Syberia"
ping 127.0.0.1 -n 5 > nul
start nircmd.exe win hide title Syberia
ping 127.0.0.1 -n 1 > nul
start nircmd.exe win hideshow title Syberia

content:
files:
- dxwnd: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_14_build.rar
- nircmd: https://www.nirsoft.net/utils/nircmd-x64.zip
- syberia: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Syberia/Syberia.bat
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing...
    executable: syberia
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: dxwnd
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        coord0: 3
        coord1: 3
        dflag0: 0
        dflag1: 0
        dflag2: 0
        dflag3: 0
        fakec0: null
        fakec1: null
        faked0: null
        faked1: null
        filterid0: 0
        filterid1: 0
        filterid2: 0
        filterid3: 0
        flag0: 673202209
        flag1: 1610629153
        flagg0: 1207959568
        flagg1: 1207959568
        flagh0: 65556
        flagh1: 20
        flagi0: 138444804
        flagi1: 4227076
        flagj0: 4224
        flagj1: 128
        flagk0: 65536
        flagk1: 4096
        flagl0: 0
        flagl1: 0
        flagm0: 0
        flagm1: 0
        flagn0: 17825796
        flagn1: 4
        flago0: 0
        flago1: 0
        icon2: 
        icon3: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresh1: 0
        initresh2: 0
        initresh3: 600
        initresw0: 800
        initresw1: 0
        initresw2: 0
        initresw3: 800
        initts0: 0
        initts1: 0
        initx0: 0
        inity0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\GOG Games\Syberia\Game.exe
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxddinterface1: 7
        maxfps0: 0
        maxfps1: 0
        maxres0: -1
        maxres1: -1
        maxx0: 0
        maxy0: 0
        minx0: 0
        miny0: 0
        module0: null
        module1: null
        module2: null
        module3: null
        monitorid0: -1
        monitorid1: 0
        monitorid2: 0
        monitorid3: -1
        notes0: null
        notes1: null
        opengllib0: null
        opengllib1: null
        opengllib2: null
        opengllib3: null
        path0: C:\GOG Games\Syberia\Game.exe
        posx0: 50
        posx1: 50
        posy0: 50
        posy1: 50
        registry0: null
        registry1: null
        renderer0: 2
        renderer1: 0
        renderer2: 3
        renderer3: 2
        scanline0: 0
        scanline1: 1
        scanline2: 1
        scanline3: 0
        sizx0: 800
        sizx1: 800
        sizy0: 600
        sizy1: 600
        slowratio0: 2
        slowratio1: 1
        startfolder0: null
        startfolder1: null
        swapeffect0: 0
        swapeffect1: 0
        tflag0: 0
        tflag1: 0
        title0: Syberia
        ver0: 0
        ver1: 0
        winver0: 0
        winver1: 0
      window:
        exepath: C:\GOG Games\Syberia\
        expert: 1
        exportpath: C:\GOG Games\Syberia\dxwnd\exports\
        iconview: 1
        posx: 1593
        posy: 465
        sizx: 320
        sizy: 225
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Syberia/
    file: nircmd
- write_file:
    content: 'cd c:\dxwnd

      start dxwnd.exe /r:0

      cd "c:\GOG Games\Syberia"

      ping 127.0.0.1 -n 5 > nul

      start nircmd.exe win hide title Syberia

      ping 127.0.0.1 -n 1 > nul

      start nircmd.exe win hideshow title Syberia'
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Syberia/Syberia.bat
wine:
  Desktop: true
